This combination medication is employed to relieve moderate to severe pain. It contains a narcotic pain reliever (hydrocodone) and a non-narcotic pain reliever (acetaminophen). Hydrocodone works in the brain to change how your body feels and responds to pain. Acetaminophen will also cut back a fever. How to use hydrocodone-acetaminophen Oral [url=http://llllllllkk.kz].[/url]
See additionally Warning section.
Read the Patient Information Leaflet if accessible from your pharmacist before you begin taking this medication and every time you get a refill. If you have got any questions, ask your doctor or pharmacist.
Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor. You may take this drug with or while not food. If you've got nausea, it may facilitate to take this drug with food. Raise your doctor or pharmacist regarding different ways in which to decrease nausea (such as lying down for one to two hours with as little head movement as attainable).
If you're using a liquid form of this medication, use a drugs measuring device to carefully measure the prescribed dose. Do not use a household spoon as a result of you will not get the correct dose.
The dosage is predicated on your medical condition and response to treatment. In children, the dosage is additionally based mostly on weight. Do not increase your dose, take the medication more frequently, or take it for a extended time than prescribed. Properly stop the medication when thus directed.
Pain medications work best if they're used as the first signs of pain occur. If you wait till the pain has worsened, the medication may not work moreover.
If you've got ongoing pain (such as due to cancer), your doctor might direct you to also take long-acting narcotic medications. In that case, this medication would possibly be used for sudden (breakthrough) pain solely as needed. Alternative non-narcotic pain relievers (like naproxen, ibuprofen) could conjointly be prescribed with this medication. Raise your doctor or pharmacist if you have any queries concerning using this product safely with alternative medication.
This medication might cause withdrawal reactions, especially if it has been used frequently for a while or in high doses. In such cases, withdrawal symptoms (like restlessness, watering eyes, runny nose, nausea, sweating, muscle aches) may occur if you suddenly stop using this medication. To forestall withdrawal reactions, your doctor might reduce your dose gradually. Ask your doctor or pharmacist for additional details, and report any withdrawal reactions immediately.
When this medication is used for a very long time, it may not work in addition. Talk with your doctor if this medication stops operating well.
Along with its benefits, this medication may rarely cause abnormal drug-seeking behavior (addiction). This risk could be increased if you've got abused alcohol or drugs within the past. Take this medication specifically as prescribed to lessen the chance of addiction.
Tell your doctor if your pain persists or worsens.

Hydrocodone works in the brain to change how your body feels and responds to pain. Acetaminophen will also cut back a fever.

Read the Patient Information Leaflet if accessible from your pharmacist before you begin taking this medication and every time you get a refill. If you have got any questions, ask your doctor or pharmacist.

Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor. You may take this drug with or while not food. If you’ve got nausea, it may facilitate to take this drug with food. To forestall withdrawal reactions, your doctor might reduce your dose gradually. Ask your doctor or pharmacist for additional details, and report any withdrawal reactions immediately.

When this medication is used for a very long time, it may not work in addition. Talk with your doctor if this medication stops operating well.

Along with its benefits, this medication may rarely cause abnormal drug-seeking behavior (addiction). This risk could be increased if you’ve got abused alcohol or drugs within the past. Take this medication specifically as prescribed to lessen the chance of addiction.
